name: monitoring-service-discovery
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: ./node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/monitoring-service-discovery.yaml --generator-key v3.0 -g openapi -o build && rm openapitools.json && mv build/openapi.json build/monitoring-service-discovery.json

author: NHS Digital
